mapper.select: SELECT A.ADMIN_NM AS OFF_DOC_FROM_NM, OD.OFF_DOC_NO, OD.OFF_DOC_FROM, F.FRCS_NM AS OFF_DOC_TO_NM, OD.OFF_DOC_TITLE, OD.OFF_DOC_CONTS, OD.OFF_DOC_FWD_DT, OD.OFF_DOC_REC_DT, OD.OFF_DOC_STATUS_YN FROM OFFICIAL_DOCUMENT OD JOIN ADMIN A ON A.ADMIN_NO = OD.OFF_DOC_FROM LEFT JOIN FRANCHISE F ON TO_NUMBER(OD.OFF_DOC_TO) = TO_NUMBER(F.FRCS_NO) ORDER BY OD.OFF_DOC_FWD_DT DESC
select * from official_document where OFF_DOC_TO = #{offDocTo} ORDER BY OFF_DOC_FWD_DT DESC

SELECT OD.OFF_DOC_NO , OD.OFF_DOC_FROM , OD.OFF_DOC_TO , OD.OFF_DOC_TITLE , OD.OFF_DOC_CONTS , OD.OFF_DOC_FWD_DT , OD.OFF_DOC_REC_DT , OD.OFF_DOC_STATUS_YN , F.FRCS_NM AS OFF_DOC_TO_NM FROM official_document OD LEFT JOIN FRANCHISE F ON TO_NUMBER(OD.OFF_DOC_TO) = TO_NUMBER(F.FRCS_NO) WHERE OD.OFF_DOC_NO = #{offDocNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE OFFICIAL_DOCUMENT SET OFF_DOC_STATUS_YN = 'Y' WHERE OFF_DOC_NO = #{offDocNo}
